name: fortisiem-get-domain-reputation
description: FortiSIEM get domain reputation on attributes in an event or incident

routes.name: Start -> Extract JSON event or incident
Extract JSON event or incident -> Set variables
Get destDomain Reputation -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Get srcName Reputation -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Get destName Reputation -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Get srcDomain Reputation -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Get domain Reputation -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Get mailDomain Reputation -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Get incidentSrc Reputation -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Get targetDomain Reputation -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Get incidentTarget Reputation -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Set variables -> If destDomain defined
Set variables -> if srcName defined
If destDomain defined -> Get destDomain Reputation
routes.label: Get Rep

routes.name: If destDomain defined -> Set General Error
routes.label: Error

routes.name: if srcName defined -> Get srcName Reputation

routes.name: if srcName defined -> Set General Error
routes.label: Error

routes.label: Error

routes.name: Set General Error -> Generate Aggregate Summary
Generate Aggregate Summary -> Set Detail
Set Detail -> Final Output
If incidentSrc defined -> Extract Incident Src Regex
If incidentTarget defined -> Extract incident target regex
Extract Incident Src Regex -> If incidentSrc Result not null
If incidentSrc Result not null -> Get incidentSrc Reputation
If incidentSrc Result not null -> Set General Error
Extract incident target regex -> If incidentTarget Result not null
If incidentTarget Result not null -> Set General Error
If incidentTarget Result not null -> Get incidentTarget Reputation
